name: Code Front End Dashboard Scheduling Agent
shortDescription: A system to generate a user dashboard for scheduling and managing social media posts, with features for content creation, intelligent agent integration, and full responsiveness.
fullDescription: This agent creates a professional user dashboard (`dashboard.html`) designed for scheduling, managing, and analyzing social media posts. The dashboard is built using HTML5, embedded CSS, and vanilla JavaScript, ensuring a modern and responsive interface. It includes features such as a sidebar with scheduling, agent management, and historical data, along with a calendar for managing post schedules. Additionally, it integrates with intelligent agents to automate post suggestions and uploads across various social media platforms like YouTube, Instagram, TikTok, and Twitter.
UseCases: 1. A social media manager needing a responsive dashboard to schedule posts for multiple platforms. 2. A business looking to automate post creation and scheduling with AI-powered suggestions for titles and descriptions. 3. A team requiring a centralized tool for tracking post history, analyzing performance, and connecting multiple social media accounts.
